title: Video: Step Sisters – Croatia
body:
Having watched this video five or six times now, I’m still to decipher exactly what story is being told.

From what I can gather, it seems to be retelling the story of a girl enticed into acting as a drug mule, and the consequence that surround her decision. Anyway, for a debut track, Croatia from Manchester’s **Step Sisters** is mightily exciting, merging elements of the likes of fellow Mancunian crooners Menage A Trois, with slightly cheesy 80’s pop, and of course, a healthy dose of The Smiths. Check, and grab the single for free over at their [Bandcamp](http://stepsistersmusic.bandcamp.com/).
